helio.framework.materialiser

Interface MaterialiserCache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RDF4JMemoryCache

    public interface MaterialiserCache
    The MaterialiserCache is meant to be implemented by classes that allow the MaterialiserEngine to store copies of the generated RDF.

    Author:
    Andrea Cimmino

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGraph(java.lang.String namedGraph, org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model model) 
      void configureRepository(java.lang.String configuration)
      This methods sets up, or modifies, the repository using a configuration file.
      void deleteGraph(java.lang.String namedGraph)
      This method erases the piece of RDF graph identified by the provided name
      void deleteGraphs()
      This method erases all the named RDF graphs within the cache
      org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model getGraph(java.lang.String namedGraph)
      This method retrieves a named graph form the cache
      org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model getGraphs()
      This method retrieves all the RDF stored in the cache under a name
      org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model getGraphs(java.lang.String... namedGraphs)
      This method retrieves a set of named graphs form the cache
      org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model solveGraphQuery(java.lang.String query)
      This method solves a CONSTRUCT or DESCRIBE SPARQL query over the RDF stored in the cache
      java.lang.String solveTupleQuery(java.lang.String query, SparqlResultsFormat format)
      This method solves a SELECT or ASK SPARQL query over the RDF stored in the cache

    • Method Detail

      • addGraph

        void addGraph(java.lang.String namedGraph,
              org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model model)

      • getGraph

        org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model getGraph(java.lang.String namedGraph)
        This method retrieves a named graph form the cache
        Parameters:
        namedGraph - the name of an RDF piece of graph
        Returns:
        a Model containing the RDF

      • getGraphs

        org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model getGraphs()
        This method retrieves all the RDF stored in the cache under a name
        Returns:
        a Model containing the stored RDF

      • getGraphs

        org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model getGraphs(java.lang.String... namedGraphs)
        This method retrieves a set of named graphs form the cache
        Parameters:
        namedGraphs - a set of names belonging to RDF pieces of graphs
        Returns:
        a Model containing the RDF

      • deleteGraph

        void deleteGraph(java.lang.String namedGraph)
        This method erases the piece of RDF graph identified by the provided name
        Parameters:
        namedGraph - the name of a piece of RDF graph to be deleted

      • solveTupleQuery

        java.lang.String solveTupleQuery(java.lang.String query,
                                 SparqlResultsFormat format)
        This method solves a SELECT or ASK SPARQL query over the RDF stored in the cache
        Parameters:
        query - a SPARQL 1.1 valid query
        format - the query answering output format
        Returns:
        a String containing the query answers

      • solveGraphQuery

        org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model solveGraphQuery(java.lang.String query)
        This method solves a CONSTRUCT or DESCRIBE SPARQL query over the RDF stored in the cache
        Parameters:
        query - a SPARQL 1.1 valid query
        Returns:
        a stream with the query answers

      • deleteGraphs

        void deleteGraphs()
        This method erases all the named RDF graphs within the cache

      • configureRepository

        void configureRepository(java.lang.String configuration)
        This methods sets up, or modifies, the repository using a configuration file.
        Parameters:
        configuration - a configuration expected by a specific MaterialiserCache, depending on the implementation the content of the variable may change
